author: noel
msg: Allow initialization String members that are never again used to be garbage collected.

author: noel
msg: Introduced a shared string table rather than have each instance carry complete copies of every SQL command.  Also released Perl5Util after initialization, so that it can be garbage collected.

author: noel
msg: MySQL SELECT string comparisions are already case-insensitive.  Using lower() in a WHERE clause effectively negates the index.

author: noel
msg: Introduced a shared string table rather than have each instance carry complete copies of every SQL command.  Also released Perl5Util after initialization, so that it can be garbage collected.
